TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FrameworkName extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName>
Public NotInheritable Class FrameworkName Implements IEquatable(Of FrameworkName)

summary.span: 表示 .NET Framework 的版本名称。

span.span: Represents the name of a version of the .NET Framework.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string frameworkName) cil managed

param.name: frameworkName
param.span: 包含 .NET Framework 版本信息的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains .NET Framework version information.

summary.span: 从包含 .NET Framework 版本信息的字符串初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from a string that contains information about a version of the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将解析采用以下格式的字符串。The constructor parses a string in the following format. *标识符*，版本 =*versionNumber*[，配置文件 =*profileName*]*identifier*, Version=*versionNumber*[, Profile=*profileName*] 在方括号中的组件是可选的。Components in square brackets are optional. 下表介绍每个组件。The following table describes each component. |组件Component|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |*identifier**identifier*|一个任意字符串，用于标识此实例。An arbitrary string that identifies this instance.| |*versionNumber**versionNumber*|一个字符串，表示.NET Framework 中，在窗体 [v] 中的版本*主要*。*次要*[。*生成*。*修订*]，其中"v"可以是大写或小写，，括号表示版本号的可选元素。A string that represents the version of the .NET Framework, in the form [v]*major*.*minor*[.*build*.*revision*], where "v" can be either uppercase or lowercase, and the brackets denote optional elements of a version number.| |*profileName**profileName*|一个任意字符串，表示.NET Framework 版本的配置文件。An arbitrary string that represents the profile of the .NET Framework version. 通常情况下，它用于表示.NET Framework，如.NET Compact Framework 或 Silverlight 的某些子集。Typically, it is used to denote some subset of the .NET Framework, such as the .NET Compact Framework or Silverlight.| 如果这两个*versionNumber*和*profileName*是否存在，它们可以按任意顺序后显示*标识符*。If both *versionNumber* and *profileName* are present, they can appear in any order after *identifier*. 这些字符串定义由"版本"和"分析"关键字，不区分大小写。These strings are defined by the "Version" and "Profile" keywords, which are not case-sensitive. 值*标识符*， *versionNumber*，和*profileName*组件定义此值对象的属性，如下所示：The values of the *identifier*, *versionNumber*, and *profileName* components define the values of this object's properties as follows: - 中的任何前导或尾随空白*标识符*删除组件和生成的字符串分配给属性。Any leading or trailing white space in the *identifier* component is removed and the resulting string is assigned to the property. - 任何前导或尾随空格和初始"v"或"V"，如果存在，会从删除`versionNumber`。Any leading or trailing white space and the initial "v" or "V", if present, are removed from the `versionNumber`. 然后将返回的字符串传递给构造函数，并且生成对象分配给属性。The returned string is then passed to the constructor, and the resulting object is assigned to the property. - 中的任何前导或尾随空白`profileName`删除组件和生成的字符串分配给属性。Any leading or trailing white space in the `profileName` component is removed and the resulting string is assigned to the property. 以下是可以传递到的有效字符串的示例构造函数：The following are examples of valid strings that can be passed to the constructor: - .NET framework，Version = 4.0.NET Framework, Version=4.0 - .NETFramework，Version = 4.0.NETFramework, Version=4.0 - .NET framework，Version = 2.0 中，配置文件 = 压缩.NET Framework, Version=2.0, Profile=Compact - .NET framework，Version = v4.0，配置文件 = 压缩.NET Framework, Version=v4.0, Profile=Compact - .NET framework 中，配置文件 = 完整，版本 = 2.0.0.NET Framework, Profile=Full, Version=2.0.0

span.span: -or- does not include a valid version number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将转换`obj`到对象并调用重载来测试相等性。The method converts `obj` to a object and calls the overload to test for equality. 如果转换不成功，或如果`obj`是`null`，该方法返回`false`。If the conversion does not succeed or if `obj` is `null`, the method returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该方法通过并返回以下比较的结果来测试相等性：The method tests for equality by returning the result of the following comparisons: - 序号比较的当前实例的属性值和`other`。An ordinal comparison of the property values of the current instance and `other`. - 序号比较的当前实例的属性值和`other`。An ordinal comparison of the property values of the current instance and `other`. - 通过调用的版本属性的比较方法。A comparison of the version properties by calling the method.

span.span: Gets the full name of this object.
The full name of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字符串属性具有以下格式：The string returned by the property has the following format: *标识符*，版本 =*版本*[，配置文件 =*配置文件*]*identifier*, Version=*version*[, Profile=*profile*] 其中*标识符*对应于属性，`version`等效于调用的值属性，和`profile`对应于属性。where *identifier* corresponds to the property, `version` is equivalent to calling on the value of the property, and `profile` corresponds to the property. 如果配置文件尚未分配到对象，该配置文件组件不包含在字符串中。If a profile has not been assigned to the object, the profile component is not included in the string. 值属性等同于返回的字符串方法。The value of the property is identical to the string returned by the method.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示两个 对象是否表示相同的 .NET Framework 版本。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two objects represent the same .NET Framework version.

returns.span: 如果 和 参数表示相同的 .NET Framework 版本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the and parameters represent the same .NET Framework version; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法定义的相等运算符的运算对象。The method defines the operation of the equality operator for objects. 不支持自定义运算符的语言可以调用方法相反。Languages that do not support custom operators can call the method instead. ## Examples 下面的示例使用相等运算符以确定是否表示正在运行的.NET framework 版本的对象是否等于支持的.NET Framework 版本。The following example uses the equality operator to determine whether a object that represents the running version of the .NET Framework is equal to a supported version of the .NET Framework. 请注意，两个版本不相等因为它们不具有相同的版本号。Note that the two versions are not equal because they do not have identical version numbers. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName.Operators#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.frameworkname.operators/cs/Operators1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName.Operators#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.frameworkname.operators/vb/Operators1.vb#1)]

span.span: if the and parameters represent different .NET Framework versions; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法定义的不相等运算符的运算对象。The method defines the operation of the inequality operator for objects. 不支持自定义运算符的语言可以通过调用测试是否不相等方法并反转其值。Languages that do not support custom operators can test for inequality by calling the method and reversing its value. ## Examples 下面的示例使用相等运算符以确定是否表示正在运行的.NET framework 版本的对象是否等于支持的.NET Framework 版本。The following example uses the equality operator to determine whether a object that represents the running version of the .NET Framework is equal to a supported version of the .NET Framework. 请注意，两个版本不相等因为它们不具有相同的版本号。Note that the two versions are not equal because they do not have identical version numbers. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName.Operators#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.frameworkname.operators/cs/Operators1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName.Operators#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.versioning.frameworkname.operators/vb/Operators1.vb#2)]
